mapper.select: select count(*) from furniture_scrap where fur_no = #{fur_no}
select fur_scrap_no, fur_no, fur_scrap_date from furniture_scrap where mem_id = #{mem_id}

select * from (select fur_no, fur_name, fur_price, fur_good_num, fur_repl_num, fur_brand_name from FURNITURE, FURNITURE_BRAND where FURNITURE.FUR_BRAND_NO = FURNITURE_BRAND.FUR_BRAND_NO order by fur_good_num DESC) where rownum < 15
select fur_pic_loc from furniture_picture where fur_no = #{fur_no}
select CONCEPT_NAME from FURNITURE_CONCEPT FC, CONCEPT CO where FC.CONCEPT_NO = CO.CONCEPT_NO and FC.FUR_NO = #{fur_no}
select FUR_KIND_DEF_NAME from FURNITURE_KIND FK, FURNITURE_KIND_DEFINE FKD where FK.FUR_KIND_DEF_NO = FKD.FUR_KIND_DEF_NO and FK.FUR_NO = #{fur_no}
mapper.update: update furniture set fur_good_num = fur_good_num+1 where fur_no = #{fur_no}
update furniture set fur_good_num = fur_good_num-1 where fur_no = #{fur_no}
update furniture set fur_repl_num = fur_repl_num+1 where fur_no = #{fur_no}
update furniture set fur_repl_num = fur_repl_num-1 where fur_no = #{fur_no}
mapper.select: select fur_pic_loc from furniture_picture where fur_no = #{fur_no} and rownum=1
select count(*) from furniture_scrap where fur_no=#{fur_no} and mem_id=#{mem_id}
mapper.insert: insert into furniture_scrap(fur_scrap_no, mem_id, fur_no, fur_scrap_date) values(seq_fur_scrap.nextval, #{mem_id}, #{fur_no}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT FS.MEM_ID as MEM_ID, MEM_NICKNAME, FUR_SCRAP_DATE FROM FURNITURE_SCRAP FS, MEMBER ME WHERE ME.MEM_ID = FS.MEM_ID AND FS.FUR_NO = #{fur_no}

select FD.FUR_KIND_DEF_NAME from FURNITURE_ROOM_KIND FR, FURNITURE_KIND FK, FURNITURE_KIND_DEFINE FD, ROOM_KIND_DEFINE RK where FR.FUR_NO = FK.FUR_NO and FK.FUR_KIND_DEF_NO = FD.FUR_KIND_DEF_NO and FR.ROOM_KIND_DEF_NO = RK.ROOM_KIND_DEF_NO and RK.ROOM_KIND_DEF_NAME = #{room_kind_def_name} group by FD.FUR_KIND_DEF_NAME

select f.fur_no, fur_name, fur_good_num, fur_repl_num, fur_pic_loc, (select count(*) from furniture_scrap where fur_no=#{fur_no}) fur_scrap_num, fur_brand_name from furniture f, furniture_picture fp, furniture_brand fb where f.fur_no = fp.fur_no and f.fur_brand_no = fb.fur_brand_no and f.fur_no = #{fur_no} and fp.fur_pic_kind = (select fur_pic_kind from furniture_picture where fur_no = #{fur_no} and rownum = 1) and rownum = 1
